org.xbmc.api.object

Class Movie

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.api.object.Movie
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ICoverArt, INamedResource

    public class Movie
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICoverArt, java.io.Serializable, INamedResource
    Stores what we can get from the movieview table.
    Author:
    Team XBMC
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
